thread.title: Alabama judge orders indigent defendants to either give blood or go to jail

title: Alabama judge orders indigent defendants to either give blood or go to jail
text:
Alabama judge orders indigent defendants to either give blood or go to jail 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
“If you don’t have any money, go out there and give blood and bring in a receipt indicating you gave blood," Alabama Judge Marvin Wiggin... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
